Name: Scapegoat
About the game: Fight intelligent enemy animals Choose and master an increasing variety of weapons Enjoy beautiful hand-drawn assets & scenery Advance through 11 levels (More on the way!) No frustrating permadeath Designed for both Gamepad & Keyboard/Mouse Collect Chests to gain ammo Collect Mushrooms to gain health
